Surging Tides.name: Surging Tides
Surging Tides.blurb: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
Surging Tides.description: Innate: All allied champions touched by any of Nami's abilities gain  60 (+ 20% AP) bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds,[ doubled ][ 120 (+ 40% AP) ] when touched by  Tidal Wave.
Surging Tides.notes: * Surging Tides will apply when an ally champion is targeted by  Ebb and Flow /  Tidecaller's Blessing or when within  Aqua Prison /  Tidal Wave's impact area.

Aqua Prison.name: Aqua Prison
Aqua Prison.blurb: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
Aqua Prison.description: Active: Nami sends a bubble towards the targeted area, dealing  magic damage to all enemies hit,  revealing them, and  suspending them for 1.5 seconds.
Aqua Prison.notes:
* Aqua Prison counts as a knockup for enabling  Last Breath.[2]
 Cast time makes Aqua Prison take ~0.875 seconds from casting to landing regardless of distance. 
 Since the area of effect has a ~162 units radius, an enemy unit with 185.14 or less movement speed (325 affected by a 53.8% slow, due to the low-end movement speed soft cap) would find it impossible to escape.
 As a result it might be necessary to have another source of crowd control in order for Aqua Prison to land. A fully-ranked  Tidecaller's Blessing powered by 376 AP would be able to slow for the amount above, although it is unlikely an enemy has not purchased movement speed by that time.

Ebb and Flow.name: Ebb and Flow
Ebb and Flow.blurb: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
Ebb and Flow.description: Active: Nami unleashes a stream of water onto the target champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies, allies and herself.
Ebb and Flow.description2: Ebb and Flow  heals allies and deals magic damage to enemies, with each bounce being 85% (+ 7.5% per 100 AP) as effective as the previous one.
Ebb and Flow.notes:
*  Spell shield will block only one bounce. Ebb and Flow will continue to bounce and the target who blocked the ability may be targeted again by a later bounce.
 Additional ability power will modify the damage/healing of Ebb and Flow by a percentage, based on the number of bounces.
 At Rank 5 with 0 AP (-15% per bounce) the first heal/damage will be 185/230, the second 157/196, and the third 130/161.
 At Rank 5 with 200 AP (no change per bounce) the heal/damage will be will remain at 245/330 throughout.
 At Rank 5 with 600 AP (+30% per bounce) the first heal/damage will be 365/530, the second 475/689, and the third 584/848.

Tidecaller's Blessing.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
Tidecaller's Blessing.blurb: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
Tidecaller's Blessing.description: Active: Nami blesses the target allied champion or herself for 6 seconds, causing her target's next three basic attacks or abilities to each deal bonus magic damage and  slow their target for 1 second.
Tidecaller's Blessing.description2: Empowered area-of-effect abilities only deal 33% − 66% (based on level) of the bonus damage to non-champions.
Tidecaller's Blessing.notes:
* Tidecaller's Blessing has no cast time and does not interrupt Nami's previous orders.
 The enhanced attacks will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal (the bonus damage does not).
 Tidecaller's Blessing has no effect against structures.

 Tidecaller's Blessing will not proc  Muramana more than once per auto attack.
 Tidecaller's Blessing's amount of on-hit damage dealt is based on Nami's own ability power on-cast.
 It's also based on the buffed ally's magic penetration rather than Nami's.

Tidal Wave.name: Tidal Wave
Tidal Wave.blurb: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
Tidal Wave.description: Active: Nami summons a tidal wave that surges forth, dealing magic damage to all units it hits,  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds and then  slowing them for 2 − 4 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
Tidal Wave.notes:
* There is a brief channel time during which Nami performs the animation.
 It can only be interrupted by death in which case the ability will not trigger and will not go on cooldown.

  Surging Tides will immediately trigger on Nami on cast.
 The wave travels for ~3.2 seconds at ~859 speed and the projectile is ~562 units wide.
 It is undodgeable by foot at 325 movement speed and 742 range.

 The wave places you slightly closer to her cast position.
